definitions: having a specified number of places or angles where the edges or sides meet
having a specified number of parties involved

examples.text: a three-cornered meeting was being arranged in Hong Kong

shortDefinitions: having specified number of parties involved

definitions: (of a person or animal) forced into a place or situation from which it is hard to escape

examples.text: nothing is more dangerous than a cornered wild beast

shortDefinitions: forced into place or situation from which it is hard to escape
